    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2362</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Structure and Function of the ear</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Struktur und Funktion des Ohrs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure et fonction de l'oreille</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura e função da orelha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura e funzione dell'orecchio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δομή και λειτουργία του αυτιού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura y función del oído</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the structure of the ear as well as the reception of sound.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nervous system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hearing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ear</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die die Struktur des Ohrs sowie 
die Aufnahme des Tones zeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre la structure de 
l'oreille aussi bien que la réception du bruit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre a estrutura da orelha 
as.well.as a recepção do som.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra la struttura 
dell'orecchio così come la ricezione del suono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει τη δομή του αυτιού 
καθώς επίσης και τη λήψη του ήχου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra la estructura del 
oído así como la recepción del sonido.</string>
          </description>
